It's difficult for us to collect all of the information,...
...all of the wreckage because it's going everywhere.
Accidents during takeoff can involve more than one aircraft.
In 1991, a Skywest Metroliner preparing to take off from Los Angeles...
...was crushed by a USAir 737 attempting to land on the same runway.
Italy's worst air disaster unfolded on a foggy morning in Milan,...
...when an SAS MD-87 collided on takeoff with a Cessna that was crossing the runway.
No one on either plane survived the impact.
One hundred and eighteen people died.
